page.description: The color of the margin lines. This property appears when the 'Line type' property is set to 'ruled'. The default margin color is #f98a6e.

section.description: Clicking the [...] button next to the Ruled margin color property opens the color picker, making it easy to select a color. Once you select a color, this will be applied to both the bold and the faded margins.

figure.title: A different ruled margin color set to a purple, #4e05a8.
